message:
"If having apps upload address books to their own services felt like a violation of personal data, wait until an also-ran service suffers an attack that leaks data revealing when and where a family is located within their residence."
http://www.zdnet.com/the-future-of-computing-is-a-battle-for-your-personal-information-7000031427/
Depressing bright future ahead of us.
